name: Feature Request
about: Suggest a new feature or enhancement for CivicQ
title: '[FEATURE] '
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## Feature Summary

A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem Statement

What problem does this feature solve? What pain point does it address?

Example: "As a [voter/candidate/admin], I'm frustrated when [describe problem], because [explain impact]."

## Proposed Solution

Describe the solution you'd like to see implemented.

## User Stories

**As a [user type], I want to [action], so that [benefit].**

Examples:
- As a voter, I want to filter questions by issue tag, so that I can focus on topics I care about.
- As a candidate, I want to schedule answer recording sessions, so that I can manage my time better.
- As a city admin, I want to export analytics to CSV, so that I can share reports with city council.

## Mockups or Examples

If applicable, add mockups, screenshots, or examples from other platforms.

## Alternative Solutions

Describe alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Additional Context

Add any other context, research, or data about the feature request here.

## Priority

How important is this feature to you?

- [ ] Critical (blocks adoption or usage)
- [ ] High (significantly improves experience)
- [ ] Medium (nice to have)
- [ ] Low (minor improvement)

## Success Metrics

How would we measure success if this feature were implemented?

Example: "50% of voters use issue filtering feature" or "Candidate satisfaction increases from 75% to 85%"

## Technical Considerations

Are there any technical constraints or dependencies we should be aware of?

## Impact Assessment

**Who benefits:**
- [ ] Voters
- [ ] Candidates
- [ ] City administrators
- [ ] Civic organizations
- [ ] All users

**Effort estimate (if known):**
- [ ] Small (< 1 week)
- [ ] Medium (1-2 weeks)
- [ ] Large (> 2 weeks)
- [ ] Epic (multiple weeks, complex)
